"Rifles Are Used Like This!":
"When you say \"Ranger\", assault rifles
are the first thing to come to mind.
Assault rifles aren't all that powerful,
but that just means that you get to
inflict more pain. Hehehehehe...

If you want to know how to use one, Lisa
will instruct you. Be sure to practice!
※Rifles only
Recommend [Nab Rappy Capture]"
